pkgmetadata.longdescription: # uule_grabberGenerates UULE codes for Google Search## InstallationYou can install the package from PyPI by using pip:```sh$ pip install uule_grabber```## Usage```python>>> import uule_grabber>>>>>> city = "Lezigne,Pays de la Loire,France">>> uule_grabber.uule(city)"w+CAIQICIfTGV6aWduZSxQYXlzIGRlIGxhIExvaXJlLEZyYW5jZQ"```## Latest Geo TargetsYou can directly download the data from Google AdWords API:https://developers.google.com/adwords/api/docs/appendix/geotargeting## CreditsPorted to Python based on:- Google UULE parameter: https://valentin.app/uule.html
